tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE MusicalEras (era_id INT PRIMARY KEY, era_name TEXT, era_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Composers (composer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, composer_name TEXT, composer_birthdate DATE, era_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (era_id) REFERENCES MusicalEras(era_id))
CREATE TABLE Compositions (composition_id INT PRIMARY KEY, composition_title TEXT, composition_date DATE, composer_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES Composers(composer_id))
CREATE TABLE Influences (influence_id INT PRIMARY KEY, influence_description TEXT, composer_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES Composers(composer_id))

CREATE TABLE Influence (
  influence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influenced_composition_id INT,
  influencer_composition_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (influenced_composition_id) REFERENCES Composition(composition_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_composition_id) REFERENCES Composition(composition_id)
);
